column4: hi all! I am a real linux newbie and i have some problems. Where i can get help? here or is there a support channel?
is it a ubuntu related problem ?
if its a ubuntu question you can ask, and if someone knows they'll help
i have an acer aspire 5610 with an Intel Pro/Wireless 3945 Wireless Card, but i cant use it, because i cant do it "ON"
